Class AbandonedStation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AbandonedStation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AbandonedStation extends AdventureCard
Represents the AbandonedStation adventure card.

This card presents a challenge where a player may sacrifice crew members and days in order to retrieve valuable materials from an abandoned station.

  • lostDays: number of days lost during the operation
  • membersRequired: number of crew members required to access the station
  • materials: list of materials that can be obtained as reward
  • resolved: whether the card has already been resolved by a player
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AbandonedStation

      public AbandonedStation(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, int membersRequired, int numBlue, int numGreen, int numYellow, int numRed) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs an AbandonedStation with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the card
      type - the type of adventure card (e.g., TRIAL, LEVEL1)
      lostDays - number of days lost if the action is taken
      membersRequired - number of crew members required to activate the station
      numBlue - number of blue materials provided
      numGreen - number of green materials provided
      numYellow - number of yellow materials provided
      numRed - number of red materials provided
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is negative

      public void resolveCard()
